street.description: A name, expressed as text, of a street or thoroughfare.

city.description: The name, expressed as text, of the city, town or village of this address.

state.description: The name, expressed as text, of the state of this address.

country.description: A unique country identifier for this party.

postcode.description: A code specifying the postcode of the address.

amount.description: A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of the currency is explicit or implied.

chargeCode.description: The unique identifier for this logistics service charge.

chargeText.description: A textual description of this logistics service charge.

calculationBasis.description: The code specifying a basis on which this service charge is to be calculated such as by volume or per unit.

amount.description: A monetary value applied to this logistics service charge.

serviceMode.description: The scope of the consignment, such as CY-CY or SD-SD.

transportEquipmentQuantity.description: A number of pieces of transport equipment, such as containers or similar unit load devices, in this consignment.

sequence.description: The sequence number for this consignment item.

information.description: Information, expressed as text, for this consignment item.

code.description: The harmonized system code specifying a type of consignment item.

UNDGIdentification.description: The code specifying the unique United Nations Dangerous Goods (UNDG) number assigned to the dangerous goods.

hazardType.description: A code specifying the type of hazard for the dangerous goods.

hazardClassification.description: A unique identifier for this hazard classification for the dangerous goods.

hazardClassVersion.description: The unique identifier of the version of a hazard class for the dangerous goods.

ems.description: The unique transport emergency procedure (EMS) identifier applicable for the dangerous goods.

originatorName.description: The proper name (human readable) of the entity that published this event.

originatorId.description: The party identification code (i.e. SCAC) of the organization publishing the event.

issue.description: A date, time, date time or other date time value for an issuance of this document.

originalIssued.description: The number of originals issued for this document.

copyIssued.description: The number of copies issued for this document.

actual.description: An actual measure for this measurement.

code.description: A code specifying a type of measurement.

name.description: A name, expressed as text, of this logistics related location.

UNLocode.description: United Nations Location Code (UNLOCODE) unique identifier for logistics related location.

printedLocation.description: The location exactly as printed on the document.

name.description: A name, expressed as text, for this party.

printedParty.description: The party name and address exactly as printed on the document.

value.description: A measure of the value of the reefer setting such as a minimum temperature value of ten degrees Celsius.

type.description: The code specifying the type of reefer setting.

unit.description: Unit used for measureing the reefer setting.

instructions.description: Specific instructions pertaining to the reefer setting.

type.description: Description specifying the type of logistics seal.

identifier.description: A unique identifier for this logistics seal.

revisionVersion.description: Element to identify the revision number if the message is an amendment.

requestDateIssuanceOfBL.description: Request date for Issuance of Bill of Lading.

letterOfCreditIssuanceDate.description: Issuance date of Letter of Credit.

letterOfCreditExpiryDate.description: Expiration date of Letter of Credit.

equipmentNumber.description: Unique identifier of the transport equipment in which cargo is stuffed.
Unique identifier for this piece of transport equipment, printed physically on the equipment.

equipmentType.description: ISO 6346 size and type code (for example "45G1")

printedEquipmentType.description: The container size and type, as printed on the transport document (for example "40 DRY 9''6").

items.description: The harmonized system code specifying a type of loaded consignment item(s).

identification.description: An identifier of this logistics means of transport, such as the International Maritime Organization number of a vessel.

name.description: The name, expressed as text, of this logistics means of transport such as the vessel name.

identification.description: To identify a journey of a means of transport, for example voyage number, flight number, trip number.

quantity.description: The number of logistics packages at this level.

type.description: A type, expressed as text, of this logistics package.

items.description: Physical markings or labels on individual packages or transport units for shipping purposes.
